Title: Allows reservists who have served or who are currently serving in the United States armed forces to be eligible for 2.5 points on civil service examinations
Summary: Allows reservists who have served or who are currently serving in the United States armed forces to be eligible for 2.5 points on civil service examinations.
LawCode: Amd ยง85, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to allowing reservists who have served or who are currently serving to be eligible for two and one-half points on civil service examinations
